org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.keyboard

Class KeyActionPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.keyboard.KeyActionPreference

  • public final class KeyActionPreference
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for setting and binding the key binding preferences to the game. Action preference must be added to parameters every single time a new key or action is added to the game.

    This object is serialized and deserialized by the GSON library.

    Since:
    2018-12-1, v0.2
